3216.verse: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ|So We saved him|134|144|6501$وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ|and his family,|115|135|6579$إِلَّا|except|65|85|86$ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ|his wife;|98|118|6580$قَدَّرْنَـٰهَا|We destined her|128|148|13255$مِنَ|(to be) of|85|95|156$ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ|those who remained behind.|206|206|6581$

3217.verse: وَأَمْطَرْنَا|And We rained|116|148|6582$عَلَيْهِم|upon them|90|155|22$مَّطَرًا‌ۖ|a rain,|75|140|6583$فَسَآءَ|and was evil|102|167|3997$مَطَرُ|(the) rain|83|115|13043$ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ|(on) those who were warned.|217|217|8243$

3218.verse: قُلِ|Say,|50|59|1922$ٱلْحَمْدُ|"All praise (be)|117|136|5$لِلَّهِ|to Allah,|75|94|6$وَسَلَـٰمٌ|and peace (be)|122|141|11113$عَلَىٰ|upon|63|82|52$عِبَادِهِ|His slaves|85|104|868$ٱلَّذِينَ|those whom|100|109|20$ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ‌ۗ|He has chosen.|122|141|1207$ءَآللَّهُ|Is Allah|68|106|8205$خَيْرٌ|better|61|98|520$أَمَّا|or what|71|108|9007$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate (with Him)?"|203|222|7075$

3219.verse: أَمَّنْ|Or Who|69|77|8132$خَلَقَ|has created|99|115|299$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|131|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|127|2280$وَأَنزَلَ|and sent down|118|134|201$لَكُم|for you|67|83|207$مِّنَ|from|50|58|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|90|157$مَآءً|water?|65|78|202$فَأَنۢبَتْنَا|And We caused to grow|179|192|13256$بِهِۦ|thereby|71|84|204$حَدَآئِقَ|gardens|82|95|13257$ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍ|of beauty (and delight),|179|186|13258$مَّا|not|42|49|262$كَانَ|it is|57|71|913$لَكُمْ|for you|67|81|207$أَن|that|48|62|655$تُنۢبِتُواْ|you cause to grow|144|158|13259$شَجَرَهَآ‌ۗ|their trees.|94|108|13260$أَءِلَـٰهٌ|Is there any god|130|144|13261$مَّعَ|with|48|55|443$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|Allah?|58|90|606$بَلْ|Nay,|50|113|848$هُمْ|they|50|113|49$قَوْمٌ|(are) a people|114|177|4788$يَعْدِلُونَ|who ascribe equals.|151|182|5407$

3221.verse: أَمَّن|Or Who|69|81|8132$يُجِيبُ|responds|79|104|13265$ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ|(to) the distressed one|174|199|13266$إِذَا|when|55|80|1370$دَعَاهُ|he calls Him|98|123|13267$وَيَكْشِفُ|and He removes|126|138|13268$ٱلسُّوٓءَ|the evil|78|86|3816$وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ|and makes you|119|134|13269$خُلَفَآءَ|inheritors|81|96|6510$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۗ|(of) the earth?|119|134|100$أَءِلَـٰهٌ|Is there any god|130|145|13261$مَّعَ|with|48|63|443$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|Allah?|58|66|606$قَلِيلاً|Little|63|166|433$مَّا|(is) what|80|287|262$تَذَكَّرُونَ|you remember.|118|222|6186$

3222.verse: أَمَّن|Or Who,|74|81|8132$يَهْدِيكُمْ|guides you|91|106|13270$فِى|in|48|62|89$ظُلُمَـٰتِ|(the) darkness[es]|144|158|5660$ٱلْبَرِّ|(of) the land|104|118|5263$وَٱلْبَحْرِ|and the sea|99|114|5657$وَمَن|and Who|78|85|1012$يُرْسِلُ|sends|77|88|6466$ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ|the winds|84|106|6467$بُشْرَۢا|(as) glad tidings|127|149|6468$بَيْنَ يَدَىْ|before|101|123|6469$رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ‌ۗ|His Mercy?|98|120|6470$أَءِلَـٰهٌ|Is there any god|130|141|13261$مَّعَ|with|48|63|443$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|Allah?|58|88|606$تَعَـٰلَى|High is|74|104|9874$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|83|123$عَمَّا|above what|98|128|724$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate (with Him).|196|211|7075$

3215.verse: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure."

3216.verse: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; We destined her to be of those who remained behind.

3217.verse: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.

3218.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Praise be to Allah, and peace upon His servants whom He has chosen. Is Allah better or what they associate with Him?"

3219.verse: [More precisely], is He [not best] who created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you rain from the sky, causing to grow thereby gardens of joyful beauty which you could not [otherwise] have grown the trees thereof? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but they are a people who ascribe equals [to Him].

3220.verse: Is He [not best] who made the earth a stable ground and placed within it rivers and made for it firmly set mountains and placed between the two seas a barrier? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but most of them do not know.

3221.verse: Is He [not best] who responds to the desperate one when he calls upon Him and removes evil and makes you inheritors of the earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Little do you remember.

3222.verse: Is He [not best] who guides you through the darknesses of the land and sea and who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy? Is there a deity with Allah? High is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
